text: aur unake samaksh saansaarik jeevan kee upama prastut karo, yah aisee hai jaise paanee ho, jise hamane aakaash se utaara to usase dharatee kee paudh ghanee hokar paraspar gunth gaee. phir vah choora-choora hokar rah gaee, jise havaen udae lie phiratee hai. allaah ko to har cheez kee saamarthy praapt hai
